code: @Test public void testServiceClassNameCreatedByRefNotation() throws Exception {     // verify the '#' notation works     CxfEndpoint endpoint = context.getEndpoint("cxf:bean:fromEndpoint", CxfEndpoint.class).     assertEquals("org.apache.camel.component.cxf.HelloServiceImpl", endpoint.getServiceClass().getName()).     assertEquals(DataFormat.POJO, endpoint.getDataFormat()).     // verify values in bean properties are ok     endpoint = context.getEndpoint("cxf:bean:fromEndpointWithProps", CxfEndpoint.class).     assertEquals(DataFormat.PAYLOAD, endpoint.getDataFormat()). }
